title: Sound
content: Sing your favorite songs, or play them and sing along.

title: Sound
content: Listen to music, and let yourself get lost in the sounds.

title: Sound
content: Listen to pleasurable sounds, like birds, or the ocean on your device.

title: Sound
content: Be mindful of the sounds around you.

title: Sound
content: Turn on a movie and listen to the sounds, tones and textures of human voices.

title: Sound
content: Listen to a meditation or lecture online or on the radio about something interesting to you.

title: Sound
content: Go to your outdoor space if you have some and listen to the sounds around you.

title: Sight
content: Visit a museum virtually and enjoy what catches your eye.

title: Sight
content: Find a beautiful flower and take in its colors.

title: Sight
content: Go outside at night in the fresh air and look at the stars.

title: Sight
content: Look at good travel photos in a book or on the internet; let them inspire you.

title: Taste
content: Eat a delicious meal; really pay attention as you savor it.

title: Taste
content: Have a soothing drink like herbal tea or hot chocolate and enjoy the flavors.

title: Taste
content: Treat yourself to dessert and eat each bite mindfully, with pleasure.

title: Taste
content: Suck on a piece of candy and let it melt in your mouth.

title: Taste
content: Chew gum and savor its flavor.

title: Touch
content: Sit in the sun (please use sunscreen), and enjoy the warmth.

title: Touch
content: Feel a soft blanket or pillow and enjoy the pleasant sensation.

title: Touch
content: Soak your feet and allow any tension or soreness to melt away.

title: Touch
content: Sink into a comfortable chair or couch, and let your body relax back into it.

title: Touch
content: Have a warm drink and enjoy the comforting feeling in your hands and as you drink it.

title: Smell
content: Smell things that are pleasant, like perfume, or oranges. Pay close attention as you enjoy the scents.

title: Smell
content: Light a scented candle and enjoy the fragrance in the air.

title: Smell
content: Smell a spice, like cinnamon, that you enjoy.

title: Smell
content: Step outside if you have outdoor space, and enjoy the smell of nature.

title: Smell
content: Look for the fresh, clean smell of citrus in your fruit or in the scents around your home.
